abstract: Chinese mergers and acquisitions made a comeback in the first half of 2010, with 99 announced deals in other countries, among which seven surpassed $1 billion, according to PricewaterhouseCoopers.
snippet: Chinese mergers and acquisitions made a comeback in the first half of 2010, with 99 announced deals in other countries, among which seven surpassed $1 billion, according to PricewaterhouseCoopers.
lead_paragraph: Chinese mergers and acquisitions made a comeback in the first half of the year, with 99 announced deals in other countries, among which seven surpassed $1 billion, according to a report by PricewaterhouseCoopers.
